name: Game Gen Pong
description:
Named and made after the classic game that came decades before it, it's my own little attempt at making a Pong game. Now I can be like those old plug and plays.

The controls are easy to get into:
Player 1 moves up and down with W and S

Player 2 moves with the Up and Down arrow keys

Reset button activated by Left Mouse click

The game goes until one player gets 5 points, in which point it'll then reset to keep the fun infinite going as long as you want it to.

The Reset button doesn't reset the score or game, rather it just places a new ball in-case the one in field at the moment tries to escape gets stuck somehow.
